title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.5 - Official address
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.5 - Official address

State Regulations

The address listed on the account wagering application is
deemed the account holder's official address for purposes of this section. The
account wagering licensee shall use the official address for all mailings, including notices, checks, withdrawal slips, account statements and other
correspondence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.5

Amended

New

York State Register July 26, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 30, eff. 7/26/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
